amendatorysection.catchline: Loans or extension of credit; improper; willful and knowing violation; liability.
amendatorysection.para: Any officer or employee of any bank who willfully and knowingly violates any provision of sections 8-141 to 8-143.01 shall be liable under his or her bond for any loss to the bank resulting therefrom.

source.para: Laws 1919, c. 190, tit. V, art. XVI, § 40, p. 701;
